items.sentence: When did Tom tell Mary to fix the broken chair?
When did you first notice that Tom was missing?
When she entered the kitchen, no one was there.
I know it wasn\'t difficult for Tom to do that.
I know most people here don\'t like doing that.
I know that that wasn\'t the answer you wanted.
Tom tucked a strand of hair behind Mary\'s ear.
I\'ll be meeting Tom in Boston early next week.
I\'ll call you back when I get to the bus stop.
Tom could be in the kitchen, but I don\'t know.
